settings.title: Settings
settings.notificationsDescription: Receive notifications about important updates and events
settings.permissionRequired: Browser permission is required to receive notifications
settings.permissionGrantedDesc: Your browser has granted permission to show notifications
settings.permissionDeniedDesc: Notifications are blocked. Please enable them in your browser settings
settings.permissionDefaultDesc: Browser permission required. Enable notifications to request permission
settings.permissionDeniedDialogDescription: Your browser has blocked notification permissions. Please follow the instructions below to enable them.
settings.instructionChrome1: Click the lock icon in the address bar
settings.instructionChrome3: Alternatively, go to Settings → Privacy and security → Site settings → Notifications
settings.instructionFirefox1: Click the lock icon in the address bar
settings.instructionFirefox3: Alternatively, go to Preferences → Privacy & Security → Permissions → Notifications
settings.instructionSafari1: Go to Safari → Settings → Websites → Notifications
settings.instructionSafari2: Find this site and change it to 'Allow'
settings.instructionSafari3: Alternatively, go to System Settings → Notifications → Safari
settings.instructionGeneric: Open your browser settings and look for 'Notifications' or 'Site permissions'. Find this website and change the notification permission to 'Allow'
settings.notificationsNotSupported: Notifications are not supported in this browser
settings.unsavedChangesDescription: You have unsaved changes. What would you like to do?
